sentences.sContent: The device can recharge a battery in about 25 minutes.
sentences.sCn: 该充电器可在约25分钟内完成给电池充电。

trans.tranCn: 充电； 休整； 再装弹药
trans.tranOther: If you recharge a battery, you put an electrical charge back into the battery by connecting it to a machine that draws power from another source of electricity
